subject: College Athletics
Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: In the wake of the 2006 N.C.A.A. tournament, which featured George Mason’s run to the Final Four, the selection committee appeared to shy away from smaller conference teams this year.
snippet: In the wake of the 2006 N.C.A.A. tournament, which featured George Mason’s run to the Final Four, the selection committee appeared to shy away from smaller conference teams this year.
